title: Easy mince, tomato and cheese pasta bake
ingredients: ['170g pasta, such as penne', '450g minced beef', '2 (295g) tins condensed tomato soup', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '225g grated Cheddar cheese', '4 tablespoons dry sherry', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
